resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103330</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103330</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207090</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Great Depression and the 1990s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der große Tiefstand und die neunziger Jahre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La grande dépression et les années 90</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O depression grande e os 1990s</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La depressione grande e gli anni 90</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μεγάλη οικονομική κρίση και η δεκαετία του '90</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gran depresión y los años 90</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">asks students to research a modern government program having roots in the New Deal. Following their research, students participate in a congressional forum where they debate which programs should be continued.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bittet Kursteilnehmer, ein modernes Regierung 
Programm zu erforschen, das Wurzeln im neuen Abkommen hat. Nach 
ihrer Forschung nehmen Kursteilnehmer an einem Kongreßforum teil, in 
dem sie debattieren, welche Programme fortgesetzt werden sollten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demande à des étudiants de rechercher un 
programme moderne de gouvernement ayant des racines dans la nouvelle 
affaire. Après leur recherche, les étudiants participent à un
forum congressionnel où ils discutent quels programmes devraient 
être continués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pede que os estudantes pesquisem um programa 
moderno do governo que tem raizes no negócio novo. Depois de 
sua pesquisa, os estudantes participam em um forum congressional onde 
debatam que programas devem ser continuados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chiede agli allievi di ricercare un programma 
moderno di governo che ha radici nel nuovo affare. A seguito 
della loro ricerca, gli allievi partecipano ad una tribuna 
congressuale in cui dibattono quali programmi dovrebbero essere 
continuati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζητά από τους σπουδαστές για να ερευνήσει ένα 
σύγχρονο κυβερνητικό πρόγραμμα που έχει τις ρίζες στη νέα 
διαπραγμάτευση. Μετά από την έρευνά τους, οι σπουδαστές 
συμμετέχουν σε ένα του Κογκρέσου φόρουμ όπου συζητούν ποια 
προγράμματα πρέπει να συνεχιστούν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">pide que los estudiantes investiguen un programa 
moderno del gobierno que tiene raíces en el nuevo reparto. 
Después de su investigación, los estudiantes participan en un 
foro del congreso donde discuten qué programas deben ser continuados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207090</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103330</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-great-depression-and-the-1990s</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
